page.title: 01KILCREGGAN AREA: DESCRIPTION
page.content: Our block is almost half sea. However, this does not mean it is uninteresting as there is much continuous activity. Many types of vessel pass the coast each day, container ships, river steamers, and, of course, nuclear and conventional submarines from Faslane. { Shore Road}runs close to the coast with large villas on one side and the beach on the other. Behind this is {Argyll Road}and behind that farmland. This area provides accommodation for those who work at the M.O.D. bases of {Coulport}and{Faslane}and also those who work in Glasgow and surrounding towns. The character of the district has changed dramatically in the past twenty years with a great deal of new building taking place.
